subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The Laver Cup, named after the Australian champion, will match the best players from Europe against the best from the rest of the world over three days of competition in singles and doubles.
snippet: The Laver Cup, named after the Australian champion, will match the best players from Europe against the best from the rest of the world over three days of competition in singles and doubles.
